description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Atlético Madrid vs Getafe in the Copa del Rey
title: Atlético Madrid vs Getafe: Copa del Rey stats & head-to-head
title_page: Atlético Madrid vs Getafe: Copa del Rey stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced %injmins% minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt saved. Borja Mayoral (Getafe) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Carles Pérez.
Post
Attempt blocked. Samuel Lino (Atletico Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Goal!
Goal! Atletico Madrid 5, Getafe 0. Alexander Sørloth (Atletico Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ángel Correa.
Goal!
Goal! Atletico Madrid 4, Getafe 0. Ángel Correa (Atletico Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Conor Gallagher.
